name: A Dark Tamagotchi Game
description:
Not all Tamagotchis are your friends. 

Made for Weekly Game Jam 119.

Theme: Tamagotchi

CONTROLS

Just click on the Tamagotchi buttons to control it like a real one.

NOTE

I recommend playing in fullscreen.

I didn't have time to do some important stuff like:

-Endings 

-Evolution based on your pet's level (so after the last tamagotchi is added it doesn't make a lot a difference in this version)

-Sound and Music

-Look for hidden bugs

But I probably will add some features after the jam.

-Vitor Mariano.
